page.title: 08HOSPITALS + NURSING HOMES
page.content: Southport Infirmary has been open about 85 years and caters for 200 patients.There are no private wards and it caters for casualties, pregnancies and small operations.Town Lane hospital will be open in 1988 and will take one of the many roles performed by other hospitals and will include the spinal unit.The hospital will be called "The Southport and Formby District General Hospital" and will include the word "Royal" if royalty opens it. There are 28 nursing,rest or old people's homes in our area,suggesting that if you've got the money, Southport is an ideal place to retire too.
